issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://dzen.ru/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdzen.ru%2F) ### Comment > Только сегодня 11.11.2022 появился этот банер в Яндекс-браузере. До этого всё нормально было. Открыл эту же страницу в других браузерах (Edge, Opera), там всё нормально, банера нет. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/XtIojRB.png)

issue.title: mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue has been escalated to [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra):
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/issues/375

Please wait until it is solved there.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, you’re probably already using AdGuard Extra so you just need to wait until it is updated.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: www.reddit.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.reddit.com/r/popular/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.reddit.com%2Fr%2Fpopular%2F) ### Comment > Using Samsung Internet along with the Adguard content blocker I've noticed that the bothersome reddit "open in app" popups keep appearing. Tried using user rules similar to those found here: > https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MrBukLau/filter-lists/master/filters/mobilefilters.txt > but could not get the site to work properly, at most the popups dissapear but also does the scroll function, making the site unusable. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/xXL368q.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Content Blocker v2.6.1 Browser: | Samsung Browser Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

issue.title: Google Play: ru.idaprikol
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ru.idaprikol](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dru.idaprikol) ### Comment > На шаге 4 ничего не понял, оставил всё как есть. > > Проблема заключается в том, что в работающем AdGuard статус защиты падает на "Выключен", появляется реклама. Ручное принудительное включение защиты не убирает рекламу. Приходится останавливать АйДаПрикол вручную и следить за статусом защиты в строке состояния. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/eTGicrH.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/Z7Gie73.jpg)
